In recent updates, NYC's mayoral race faces accusations of Islamophobia, while a teenager is released from illegal ICE detention, and a man is extradited for robbing a 99-year-old landlord who later died. Additionally, the city council has approved significant housing developments and proposed laws to strengthen tenant protections.
